OOC: Lay off.  A council member is fine in debates, but if I accept 
the damage then you can't do much about it, unless you say a meteor 
hit my char along with his weapons and that's just stupid.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:

of

> the rule you broke was: Do not fire too many shots in one post. The 
> limit is: 25 rapid fire shots, 8 semi automatic shots, 4 blasts, and 
> 2 explosives. In addition to that, you can't fire more than two 
> weapons in one post (no more than one if its explosives).
